# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/betaAppReviewDetail | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/betaAppReviewDetail ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-betaappreviewdetail)

-  GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/betaAppReviewDetail 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/betaAppReviewDetail

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-betaappreviewdetail#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/apps/{id}/relationships/betaAppReviewDetail
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-betaappreviewdetail#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-betaappreviewdetail#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppBetaAppReviewDetailLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appbetaappreviewdetaillinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-betaappreviewdetail#see-also)

[`Read the Beta App Review Details Resource of an App`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-betaappreviewdetail)Get the beta app review details for a specific app.[`Read the Beta License Agreement of an App`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-betalicenseagreement)Get the beta license agreement for a specific app.[`GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/betaLicenseAgreement`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-betalicenseagreement)[`List All Beta App Localizations of an App`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-betaapplocalizations)Get a list of localized beta test information for a specific app.[`GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/betaAppLocalizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-betaapplocalizations)
